# limel-example-progress-flow-secondary-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Example with secondary text

A `secondaryText` can be used to add further information to steps.
This could be for instance a timestamp of when a step was activated by the user
or an explainatory text.

## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [limel-progress-flow](..)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  limel-example-progress-flow-secondary-text --> limel-progress-flow
  limel-progress-flow --> limel-progress-flow-item
  limel-progress-flow-item --> limel-icon
  style limel-example-progress-flow-secondary-text fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
